params._priceOracle: Address of price oracle (can be zero initially)

params.decimals: Desired decimal places for the value

returns.valueInUsd: The total collateral value in USD

params.decimals: Desired decimal places for the price

returns.priceInUsd: The current price in USD with specified decimals

params.amount: The amount of collateral to lock
params.commitment: The commitment for the new note

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.underlyingToken: The ERC20 token used as collateral

params.amount: The amount of collateral to release
params.nullifier: The nullifier of the burned note
params.recipient: The address to receive the released collateral

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Initialize CollateralManager with optional price oracle

getTotalCollateral(address).notice: Get total collateral locked for a zkERC20 token

getTotalCollateralValue(address,uint8).notice: Get the total collateral value in USD

getUnderlyingToken(address).notice: Get the underlying ERC20 token for a zkERC20

getUnderlyingTokenPrice(address,uint8).notice: Get the current price of underlying token in USD

isAuthorized(address).notice: Check if a zkERC20 token is authorized

lockCollateral(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: Lock ERC20 collateral to mint zkERC20 notes

registerZkToken(address,address).notice: Register a new zkERC20 token with its underlying collateral token

releaseCollateral(address,address,uint25.notice: Release ERC20 collateral when burning zkERC20 notes

setAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Authorize or deauthorize a zkERC20 token

totalCollateral(address).notice: Mapping of zkERC20 token => total collateral locked

underlyingTokens(address).notice: Mapping of zkERC20 token => underlying ERC20 token
